text: "Take the Long Way Home" is a 1979 song by English rock band Supertramp and is the last song from their sixth studio album Breakfast in America. It went to number 4 in Canada and number 10 in the United States. It was also a minor hit in Europe. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Supertramp songs
title: Take the Long Way Home (Supertramp song)
